channel.title: Scott on More than Men
channel.description: Recent content in Scott on More than Men

item.title: You never get a second chance...
item.description: …to make a first impression. Typically we find this “gem” of advice applying to an individual’s approach to an important meeting of some sort or even daily life. However, as a “First TAMmer”, I had the opportunity to do a little role reversal and get a true first impression from the active skeptic community at TAM2012. I’ve been a skeptic for a long while, but never really considered seeking out or joining any skeptic community.
